name: A Philosopher's Toy Box
description:
A Philosopher's Toy Box is a set of blocks for thinkers. I made it for all who would love it hook, line, and sinker. There is no goal, no timer, no conflict, no score. But plenty to uncover, discover and explore. A Philosopher's Toy Box is, well,  a toy. One for every tinkerer to enjoy. Experiment with its mechanics. Wrestle with its metaphysics. But, please, don't obsess over the unfinished specifics. (After all, this is only a prototype.)

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys - MOVE

Mouse - INTERACT

Esc - RESTART/SAVE

C - CHANGE COLOR SCHEME

Space - ????
